problem_text_cn: 如图,直线l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},直线AC分别交l_{1},l_{2},l_{3}于点A,B,C,直线DF分别交l_{1},l_{2},l_{3}于点D,E,F,AC与DF相交于点H,如果AB=5,BH=1,CH=2,那么的值等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the line l_{N_0}∥l_{N_1}∥l_{N_2}, the line AC intersects l_{N_3},l_{N_4},l_{N_5} at points A, B, C, and the line DF intersects l_{N_6},l_{N_7},l_{N_8} at points D and E respectively , F, AC and DF intersect at point H, if AB=N_9,BH=N_10,CH=N_11,then the value is equal to ()
raw_comment: 本题考查平行线分线段成比例,解题的关键是明确题意,找出所求问题需要的条件．
